author: @EQAlerts
title: Weak Mag. 2.4 Earthquake - 7.3 km North of Adrano, Catania, Sicily, Italy, on Wednesday, Jan 7, 2026, at 12:57 pm (GMT +1)
text:
A light magnitude 2.4 earthquake hit 7.3 km (4.5 mi) away from Adrano, Sicily, Italy, around noon of Wednesday, Jan 7, 2026 at 12.57 pm local time (GMT +1). The quake had a very shallow depth of 12.7 km (8 mi) and was not felt (or at least not reported so).
